dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from WomentoWomen.com
dmca.body:
NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT 

1. Allegedly infringed materials: 
The copyrighted work at issue is the article created in 2005, entitled "Sugar substitutes and the potential danger of splenda" which appears at: 
http://www.womentowomen.com/nutritionandweightloss/splenda.as 

2. Location of the material claimed to infringe copyright: 
http://www.sweetritecom/id27.html
"The Dangers of Artificial Sugars"
Observed date 05.15.06 

3. My contact information is as follows: 
Maria Winn 
Women to Women's Personal Program 
P.O. Box 306 
Portland, ME 04112 USA 
Tel: 207-791-7880 
Fax: 207-791-7869 
mwinn@womentowomen.com 

4. The contact information of the allegedly infringing web page owner is as follows: 
Name: Fred Catalano 
Address: 4332 Bronte P1 Sarasota, FL 34241 
Tel: 800-558-5009 
Fax: 
e-mail: medifast04@msn.com 

5. I have good-faith belief that the use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web page is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

[signed]
Maria Winn 
07.20.06
